content:
Dear All,

this PR is now failing a test. The reason is that I moved the definition of odd to a new file that I no longer imported by the test.

Is it ok if I fix this by adding import algebra.parity at the beginning of this file?

Thanks!

(In case someone wants to see the failed test, the commit is f91178af24382c6e2238fb0bdd09aa9456f67d48)
That sounds to me like the obvious fix. Unless there's a comment somewhere in the test file discouraging imports, I wouldn't hesitate!
Great, thanks for the comment! The file says nothing about not importing other things, so I'll go ahead with the fix.
